/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3  -Wno-deprecated -fPIC -DLINUX  -shared -Wl,-soname,libcuda_lib.so -o libcuda_lib.so   -L/usr/local/cuda-10.0/lib64 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-10.0/lib64 /usr/local/cuda-10.0/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so /usr/local/cuda-10.0/lib64/libcudadevrt.a
